description:
net: fix LookupNS on Plan 9

use correct field count when resolving nameservers via /net/dns on Plan 9.

we incorrectly check for 4 fields instead of 3 when parsing the result of /net/dns, and get no results

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM

Please mention LookupNS in the first line of the CL description.
Something like "net: fix LookupNS on Plan 9" and then the rest
of the description can go on subsequent lines.

Thanks,
  Anthony

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=bc84bcc515f9 ***

net: fix LookupNS on Plan 9

use correct field count when resolving nameservers via /net/dns on Plan 9.

we incorrectly check for 4 fields instead of 3 when parsing the result of /net/dns, and get no results
